Ben's Books.knownFor: “ Great Little Bookstore ” Reviewed May 31, 2013 Only bookstore in the area. An amazing amount of books in a small space. Owned by a retired gentleman. Quite a nice fellow. My wife got a stack of new reading material for $7.50. Cash only though. If you are a reader, its worth stopping Helpful? Thank Thomas L Report

Skydive Taft.knownFor: “ The best place in So Cal to jump ” Reviewed February 11, 2015 I have been jumping for a while and the new owners here make you part of the family. I wouldnt go anywhere else. Skydive Taft is the best!! Helpful? Thank scubacindy818 Report
